questions:
1. What is the scientific and family name of pole sitao? 

The scientific and family nameof pole sitao is *vigna uniguiculata subsp. sesquipedalis (L.) Verdc.)*

 

2. What is the growth habit of pole sitao?

*Viny* and *herbaceous*

questions:
1. What is the seeding rate of pole sitao per hectare? *10-15 kg/ha*

2. How many seeds are needed in a linear meter? *15-18 seeds per linear meter*

3. When to install trellis? *14 DAE*

params.textField:
1. What is the general fertilizer recommended rate for pole sitao? *135-135-112 kg NPK per hectare*

2. What is the water requirement of pole sitao per cropping season? *500-600 mm*

3. How pole sitao can tolerate drought condition? *due to deep root system*

4. What will happen to the crop if there is too much application of water? *Flower drop root rot*

5. It is one of the most destructive of all roots organisms in beans. *Fusarium wilt or root rot*

6. An insect pest which feed on the green inner portion of the leaves leaving white zigzag lines. *Leafminers*

7. Give examples of crop repellant that can be used in controlling pod borer. *Basil, marigold, citronella,onion*

8. Active vector of viral diseases. *Aphids*

9. What will be the type of soil to control/manage fusarium wilt or root rot? *Well-drained soil*

10. When to harvest young pods? *At 7-10 days after flowering or 45-50 days after crop emergence.*

11. Why harvested produce is kept under shade area? *To avoid weight loss (minimize transpiration loss).*

12. What are the strategies to prolong the shelf life of pods? *Using perforated plastic bag, dipping in coconut water, and storage in cool dry place.*

13. What is the moisture content of the seeds for planting material for better storage life? *10-12% is the moisture content of seeds.*
